website_summaries.verdict: This is a stylish, alternative down vest that's less expensive than it looks.
pros: The black trim and quilted texture is a timeless, fashionable look
The fabric is luxuriously thick, and the vest is loose enough for plenty of layering
cons: Not very long, may not be ideal for tall women

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. I wear a small in shirts, but I usually order a medium in vests.This fit true to size. No need to size up. The quality is excellent. The shipping took about a week. Faster than I expected. For reference I am 5'7 and 128 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: CWE

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and delivery. Very happy with this. I can't wait for it to get cold so I can wear it! I read the reviews because I wasn't sure to buy a small or medium because I tend to be in between sizes. I am 5'5" and 124lbs (size B cup for chest measurements) and I ordered a small. Fits perfectly! I included a photo of me without the vest just so you can see my body type without it.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Stricker

customer_reviews.title: Making all of my Pinterest board dreams come true
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! I've been covering the J Crew vest for years via Pinterest and recently tried it on in stores. Sadly it was a weird material that felt cheap and wasn't a true black...almost looked navy. And the price left A LOT to be desired. Enter this vest. Good thick fabric, nice and warm, SUPER cute and very budget friendly. I'm obsessed. For reference I'm 6' tall and 205 pounds. The XL zips up but doesn't have a ton of room underneath if I wanted to wear something thick and zip it. Fortunately I'm going to wear it open. BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: HGB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews on this product made me a little weary of purchasing, but I did and I'm glad! Upon receiving this I saw that the stitching looked pretty good, the print is actually stitched in, not printed. The vest is heavy and warm and very fashion forward. I wore it to a party the day I received it in the mail and got tons of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kramer

customer_reviews.title: cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love this vest. it’s so cute and super cozy without being too thick. i personally hate right underarms on sleeveless things so the more roomy underarm is perfect. yesterday i wore this over a sweater! the reason for the 3 stars is because it started pillong after having only worn it a couple of hours. plus some of the inner lining satin is fraying close to the zipper. which brings me to the zipper. it’s a cool rose-goldish color but feels super cheap. i had difficulty unzipping... kept getting stuck. otherwise fun and cute and even great for the office. i’m 5’5” and weigh 120 and bought a medium so it’d feel good over sweaters in winter... enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Cheap materials. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. Looks good from a distance. Does Fit somewhat smaller than I thought, or maybe I’m just fatter than I think I am. I don’t like that it’s not stretchy whatsoever and I really don’t like the cheap lining on the inside. Overall this is a great piece and a decent alternative to the JCrew vest. Pockets are not very secure in that there’s no zippers and things can easily fall out. I don’t think I have washed it yet so I cannot comment on post-wash results. I’m a bit scared to wash it just in case it all just falls apart... I might update this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest! So glad i ordered it!
customer_reviews.text: Got my Herringbone vest today and I love it!! The quality is great it looks well made and expensive. The fit is good, I'm 5'1" and about 116 lbs. I ordered a small and it's slightly big/bulky on me but not much and overall it looks so cute that being a little big is not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped it was!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super happy with my purchase! It is great quilted quality and well made. For my tall girls I'm 6'1 and 155 lbs (thanks to a recent cruise) 36 C cup bra with an athletic build. I purchased medium and fit perfectly with enough room for sweaters under comfortably. This will definitely be in my fall winter rotation. Shipping was fast will definitely buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Millie Mi

customer_reviews.title: Order your normal size or up if you want breathing room while zipped
customer_reviews.text: I was cautiously optimistic when I ordered this vest. My sister ordered the same vest a year earlier and loved hers. I noticed some people noted a chemical smell in the reviews. Neither of our vests had this problem. Soft herringbone material, gold zipper and black piping on the pockets look nice not cheap. Great J. crew knockoff for the price. I ordered a small which is my typical size for a vest or coat. I’m glad I didn’t size down or I wouldn’t have been able to wear a thick sweater and zip it. So I would say order your normal size or if you want a roomier fit size up.
customer_reviews.author: AimeeM

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart at the seams -- LITERALLY!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: It's now coming apart at the right side pocket's seam. Seriously, Merokeety? I think a product like this one should hold up adequately after no more than five wears. I'm terribly disappointed. And as much as I love the look of it, I won't buy another one again. And if I can't fix this new issue, it's going to be donated or repurposed in some manner. Please take some time to improve your product's quality. ORIGNAL: I really like this vest. It’s warm, stylish and comfortable. But I didn’t notice that it was apart at one of the seams. This is frustrating because I’m not sure if it can be fixed without disturbing the lining.
customer_reviews.author: SGraf

customer_reviews.title: favorite thing in my wardrobe right now
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this vest EVERY time I wear it - and that's a lot. I originally bought a small, but it felt a little boxy on me, so I gave it to my sister and bought an xs. She was thrilled! And the xs fits me perfectly (5'5; 128 pounds). If you want to put bulky sweaters under, order true to size. If you want it to fit tighter against your body, consider sizing down. However, the small did fit me I just liked the xs better personally. The quality is wonderful, the gold zipper is a nice accent, and the pockets actually fit things!! I wish I had this in every color.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka

customer_reviews.title: It's boxy and smelled horrific
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, the vest is very cute and stylish. With that being said, it is very boxy and a little unflattering depending on what you are wearing. I got the XS and it was unusually boxy on me even though I am 5'3", 128 lbs. I got over the boxiness and decided to keep the vest. The other issue is the smell. It is horrible. It smelled very musty so I couldn't wear it for more than an hour. I washed it and the smell went away (thank God) but that was bad. Overall, I like the look of the vest and now that it smells better, I am decently happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Walls

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I was t expecting to receive this until (around) Nov 27, 2018 but it arrives today, just two days after purchase. The quality of this vest is quite well! It is quilted and thick. The zipper is steel and glides well. The pockets are large enough to fit my iPhone 6splus. Unlike other reviews, my best is sewn well and has no defects. Highly impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jackyl764

customer_reviews.title: Medium is too big for 5'9", 145 lbs
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9" and 145 lbs, 36D, and I ordered the medium. I am probably going to return it because it felt pretty big. My fiance put it on (6'4" and over 200 lbs) and it looked like it fit him better than me. Not only that, but the shipping was a nightmare. It was supposed to arrive on a Friday, and I finally got it the following Tuesday. It still says it's out for delivery though... just not worth the trouble or the wait for something that fits so poorly. I do like the look, and it feels soft and warm, so it's not all bad, but I am just disappointed in the fit and how the shipping went.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May run a little small, order larger size
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size medium in this kind of outerwear. However I had to return the medium and order a large. I am 5’3”, And weigh 140. I am normally a size 10/12, but the medium and this was too small. Could not zip it. The large is a much better fit. I expect this to be great with a turtleneck under it For our Texas Winter. Nice material, sturdy zipper, and I love herringbone
customer_reviews.author: Janice P

customer_reviews.title: Cute vest, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This vest is made nicely, especially for the money. It is somewhat stiff, but still flattering. I’m a size 10, med/lg. I’m 5’6, 165 lbs. i followed the advice given in some of the reviews and opted to go with a medium instead of a large. It fits well. It is a little snug on my hips when I zip it up, but not too bad. The reason I didn’t give more stars is because when I received the vest in the mail, it stunk so bad of mildew I had to launder it 3 times to get the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear large in tops. Sometimes an xl in coats due to my 38c-d bust. It fit me perfectly. I havent wore it to work yet so idk if it will be too tight when I sit down at my desk. I can zip up without sucking in but it's close to being not able to be zipped up. Hits right above my butt. Very cute and better quality than I expected! Its medium thick so not puffy but not thin as a shirt either.
customer_reviews.author: GOLDENGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with my vest
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with my vest!!! I wasn't sure about getting it with the reviews I read, but it was definitely worth the gamble! Will use as a staple piece...love it!!!😍
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: LOOK NO FURTHER for your Herringbone Vest!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Just be aware... I had to return and go a size down because I didn't really pay attention to the measurements. Normally I am a medium but the small ended up fitting me with room to spare. It does fit a little bit "boxy" also but I think it is great for cold weather! Especially if you want to wear a full hoodie underneath. EXCELLENT quality!!! Better than what you are going to find from the J. Crew Factory Store (which gives you a plastic version) at a much better price. Already have gotten tons of compliments and people asking where I got the vest!!
customer_reviews.author: aCn

customer_reviews.title: Not deserving of all the hype.
customer_reviews.text: I got this from a site I follow on FB of lightning deals and cool finds on Amazon mostly and they listed this as a shopper favorite, but meh. I'm not impressed. Its not the greatest fabric, kinda itchy and really clunky looking. Also the zipper is the cheapest looking fake gold color its really stands out and make the entire think have an overall cheap quality. I just don't think it looks very fashionable. A silver zipper would have been way better. I am most likely out of the window for returns, but I might give it a shot. It's just not a great vest - I'd never wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Bookapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality vest, just as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The picture might be another brand’s vest, but this is an accurate representation of the vest you will receive. The fit could be a bit less square but other than that, I love this vest and know it will get a lot of wear. I bought this on sale and I think the price is still pretty high, but it is comparable to a much more expensive product. I recommend this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: HoosierGator

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading through the reviews and I wish I would have gotten a smaller size. I got a medium (5'7 150lbs, small bust/ large hips) as I typically wear medium tops and its really large on me. I should have returned it for a small but I ended up just taking it in myself bc I do like the length of this vest on me. The quality is great and it is pretty. Just size down in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Family

customer_reviews.title: 38F and I can zip it(XL)!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an XL. I have large breasts (38DD/F) and I can zip it up with a tank top and flannel under it. It is a bit "wide" between the shoulders, but I need the room for my bust, and it still does look very nice. I also have a short torso, and it goes a a bit longer down on my hips than what it appears to do so on most, and it still fits, zipped and unzipped. I see this definitely becoming a wardrobe staple.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought small, I am 5’5”, 36” chest usually wearing American S or M and it fits well, perfect length. It is the exact replica or same vest as the one previously sold in JCrew stores. They ran out of my size, sold a limited amount and it was no more. So happy I finally found it, at $100 less! fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Almost, but not quite
customer_reviews.text: This vest is decent for the price - I guess. It came vacuum sealed and feels a bit like old carpet. The color is also a lot lighter than the advertised color. If the color was as advertised and the Sherpa a bit softer this would have been 5 stars. Sadly I will return it and hold out for a more quality piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber A. Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a warm short vest?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small size. I actually needed the XS but it was out of stock. I altered it to fit and also sewed the bottom of the pockets down. It is as pictured and hits right above the hips. This vest keeps my core toasty warm. It's much warmer than my regular fleece vest. I would order another one without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: P. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest, Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous ordering this based on the mix of reviews but I have to say I’m really satisfied. The vest is great quality and looks almost exactly like the picture. I’m usually between a medium and a large in tops and I ordered a medium because I didn’t want it to be baggy. It’s a little snug but it does fit so I’d say order the size you normally wear, don’t go up at all. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: s_westlake

customer_reviews.title: Cute and heavyweight vest
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest. It’s a little thicker than I thought it would be, which is a good thing! However, it’s a little snug. I leave it unzipped so it is fine but I can barely zip it and if I do, way too snug! I liked it so much though, just decided to keep it anyways and wear unzipped always
customer_reviews.author: Bethany B

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Quality is pretty good, zipper is a very shiny fake brass color which isn't the best. I like that its actually herringbone and not a printed puffer vest like another competitor brand. I'm a 6-8 and the medium fits great. Note the bust is tighter than the size chart. I bought a second as a gift and her bust was a 34" but the small was too small. The bust part is tighter than the stomach part so base your size on that. This looks great over sweaters and plaid button ups!
customer_reviews.author: RoxyBo

customer_reviews.title: Staple in my clothing collection.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest!! 5'8" 140lb and a 34D, I love to keep it zipped up to where it hits under my chest. My chest is a little too large to allow it to zip all the way, but who does that? This vest is exactly as it appears in the photos. Yes, it is a fabric made into the pattern and NOT the pattern printed on the fabric. The inside is a diamond shaped sewn black fabric. It is pretty warm and I receive at least 3 compliments every time I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Better than name brand!
customer_reviews.text: Literally wearing this while writing the review. I love this vest! I originally wanted the J. Crew vest that is very similar to this one however.... after going to the store I found theirs was only a printed herringbone pattern... so not worth it. This vest is ACTUAL Herringbone and warm! I get tons of compliments on it. For reference I'm 5'4" and 140 lbs. I would recommend this vest to anyone looking for something fun and versatile to add to their wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on my vest isn’t very smooth and takes a couple of tries to get through the middle (ironically where I’m smallest). I ordered a Medium based on other reviews and it’s snug along my hips and bust (5’6”, 150lbs, curvy). Overall though I really like it, I’ll just be styling it open, which was the plan anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Madden12

customer_reviews.title: Improper sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this herringbone vest according to the manufacturer's sizing recommendations. That was a mistake. A large did not come anywhere near fitting my bust or come close to zipping. Normally I wear a large in most jackets or vests. Very disappointed in this purchase. The vest itself is well made, the material is beautiful and the gold zipper is a classy touch. Very preppy and could have been a staple in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Greendale Mom

customer_reviews.title: WARM AND BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!!! I really loved the j crew vest I saw in their store...until i saw the $149 price tag. This vest is basically the same exact thing except for $30. It's warm, BEAUTIFUL and has exceptional quality for the price.The pockets are large, and can easily fit my bulky wallet or phone in them. I am 5'1, 115 lbs and the XS vest fit perfectly!!! Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: Not for full hips
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice vest. It really it. It fits wonderfully on top, and I am a 36F. I also have the hips to match the top. I have very full hips, especially have having a kid. My hips didn't seem to go back "down". It is so tight on my hips. It does not fit fuller hips at all!
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Nice but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vest. Seems well made and looks nice. A little puffy, but not as thick as a normal outerwear puffy jacket. Based on other reviews, I ordered a medium, which is generally what I wear. It's WAY too small. Going to exchange for a large and hope that it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! So happy with this vest. I am typically somewhere between a medium and large, decided to order the medium because vests are really not flattering if they aren't fitted. The medium fits snuggly, it was a little tight to zip up but it soooo flattering. Looks so high quality! Better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger bust so I purchased and XL and unfortunately it won’t zip over my chest without it being super tight. Other than an ounce of being the quality is very nice and it’s a very pretty vest. If it fit me I’d give this thing five stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bren M.

customer_reviews.title: Yes get it!
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Yes YES. I'll join the other 5 star reviews. This is so cute. First concern was what size. I'm 5"6 @140. Size 6 waist 27. With size B boobs. I got the small and I'm happy. It's snug. I don't think I could wear a big thick sweater under it but I wanted to wear it with dress shirts & thinner long sleeve tops. It is put together well. No loose treads/holes. Love the gold detail. The outside fabric is bit itchy but it's on outside not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nanners

customer_reviews.title: Good Jcrew dupe!
customer_reviews.text: Got this because I wanted the Jcrew vest but they weren't selling it. This is a pretty good dupe - I don't have a Jcrew one so I can't speak to that exactly but the only difference I'd point out is this one is a bit less fitted. So I ordered a small (I'm 5'4" 130 lbs 34D, usually wear smalls and mediums) and the size is pretty good, I definitely wouldn't want anything larger. All in all for this price I'm really happy with the vest.
customer_reviews.author: Jess P

customer_reviews.title: Good quality vest for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality vest for the price. Mine came with no tears or rips! However I ordered a large due to the reviews saying to go up a size, and I was swimming in it. My usual size is a medium so I got a large just to be safe in case I wanted to layer of have some moving room but it was huge on me and just didn't look right. I will be returning and purchasing a size medium. I'm about 140 pounds and about 5'3!
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Everyone thinks this is that J Crew vest
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I honestly hadn't even seen or heard about the J Crew vest that people rave about before I bought & wore this. However, I know about it now because women everywhere compliment me on it. They're always astounded when I tell them it's from Amazon. The quality is great; it's warm and has a slim profile. I was skeptical when I bought it, but it is a fantastic vest.
customer_reviews.author: PattyD333

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but not fitted well around waistline
customer_reviews.text: The vest is really cute, but it could be more fitted around the waist. There was a TERRIBLE chemical smell when I opened up the shipping box. Left the vest to hang outside for quite some time, which helped considerably reduce but not eliminate the weirdly stinky chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: resewsd

customer_reviews.title: Great Underlayer
customer_reviews.text: So I just went to Illinois this past weekend Dec 15 and it was perfect for layering under clothes. It is not a waffle shirt or made from polyester - which is what I thought. I bought the white one and it is 100% cotton and double bed pucker-like knit jersey that feels thicker than most. Better than almost any waffle thermal I've owned before.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sorto

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest! The fit isn't perfect but the look of the best makes up for it. It fits well in the chest but is a little tighter than normal around the waist but it works. I tried the medium and small and settled on the small. For reference, I'm 5'7, 140 lbs, 32dd.
customer_reviews.author: MVP

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift for my mom who is very petite. I can tell that this will fit her perfectly! The quality is amazing and this is the first time I have been impressed by a piece of clothing I have ordered from Amazon. I might order myself one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Alberes

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, but a little tight on the chest!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, I have a small waist but I’m a bit bigger chested. So it won’t zip up all the way without being too tight. But it’s fits great otherwise and not tight in the underarms! Love it! Looks just like the ones I’ve bought from J.Crew!
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: Very happy that I took a chance and bought this vest! The vest is well made and the fit is great! For reference, I used the sizing chart to determine my size.
customer_reviews.author: EEP

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was a bit big so I sent it back and got the small. I’m 5’4 and 140 pounds. Now I do work out so my weight in appearance appears more 130. Love this vest. So warm and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Shiver

customer_reviews.title: Odd cut
customer_reviews.text: Tight around chest but baggy at armpits. Odd cut Liked the material and look
customer_reviews.author: SEBV

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’3” and 130 and the medium fits nice. I’m a 34 D so the medium is nicer for zipping up, but a small might have worked out too. I like a little more room though in vests. Quality is good, looks like an expensive piece.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!!
customer_reviews.text: First off, thanks for everyone who wrote a review because it helped me with getting the right size! I got a medium and it fit perfectly! For reference i'm 5'9" 160 and it fits/looks great! Quality is really good, no weird smells or rips and I have enough room to put a light jacket or sweater under. I will say for my busty ladies, you may need to go a size up because you'll have trouble zipping it to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice vest that is actually warm!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of my fave Amazon Fashion purchases! It's super trendy and actually pretty warm. I'd only recommend, depending on the fit you're going for, to size up. At 179 with a XL I notice it works well with long sleeve tees and still zips up, however with turtlenecks trying to zip up this vest can get a tad snug and bulky. Overall it wasn't enough to make me return and I have already worn it a couple times since purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: I was seeing this vest in a variety of outfits on Pinterest and really liked it. I didn't want to pay a lot for it since I considered it more of a trendy item. I ordered a large (In tops/jackets I typically wear a 10-12 but I figured this would probably run a little small) It fits perfectly. I was very surprised at the quality. It's very well made, the fabric looks like wool and the print even matches on the seams. It can easily be dressed up or be worn casually. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: galeb

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this vest! It has the look of the other popular tweed/herringbone vests like from J. Crew but without the hefty price tag. I went back and forth between an XS and a small and settled on the XS. It fits perfectly. I think the small would have looked a little too boxy bc the material is thicker. For reference: I'm 5'4, size 2/4 129lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Boland

customer_reviews.title: Great vest!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Bought an xl and typically wear xl vests. For reference I am a medium/large tops in womens brands unless it's coats/jackets then I size up to xl. 38D chest and large in my rib cage. Vest fit exactly as anticipated and is well constructed and very warm!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Comfy - Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I had this vest on my wishlist for soo long and I finally decided to buy it. I LOVE IT, it's stunning. The vest looks exactly like in the pictures. I'm 5'2", 145lb, 36C and usually wear M/L shirt. I decided to go with a medium, its a bit tight around my boobies but is not uncomfortable and at least for me is not a big deal. I'm a very happy and satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: imfleurlais

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest! So stylish and elegant! Price was so much better than the Gap or other department stores! I bought 2 one in small for my daughter on in large for myself! This is not printed it’s fabric and it’s beautiful! Goes with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vest and I get compliments on it all of the time. I bought it before, but unfortunately outgrew it (thx COVID), but I knew that I needed this back in my winter rotation! I HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is adorable!!! It is a little small on me and seems super tight in the chest. I kept it as it fits and everyone tells me it looks cute it just fits tighter than I'd hoped. I should have ordered a size up!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality, size up 1 size.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Beautiful vest. SO much better than I could have ever expected/hoped... unfortunately it was too snug so I sent it back. For reference: I ordered the XL. I am usually a L/XL/16. 38G. Hoping I can find it in a larger size from another vendor. Broke my heart to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit. Bad zipper
customer_reviews.text: I've been watching this vest for a while and the price went down so I finally snagged it. It's great material it's warm and puffy but not too puffy. It fits great. My only complaint is that the zipper is pretty finnicky and gets stuck.
customer_reviews.author: RugbYogi

customer_reviews.title: Nice versatile vest
customer_reviews.text: This is such a versatile vest. Great quality textured fabric and quilted soft. It is a little big (I am 4'10", 97 lbs) and I ordered XS. I know I'm small, but my coworker ordered one in large (which she wears normally) when she saw mine and had to return it for a medium (which fit her perfectly). I have received at least a dozen compliments on it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit, Looks Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this vest fits and wears, very good quality material I wore it to colorado on a ski trip and it keeps you warm as well. The look of this is very expensive and details are on point so glad I have this in my closet now a must buy if you love vests !!! follow me on momlifebynicole - mom life
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C

customer_reviews.title: Cute, versatile option!
customer_reviews.text: Cute Vest! Fits TTS, has some padding so it is warm. Shipped quickly but was shoved into smallest bag possible so it had several wrinkles. Also needed to air out a bit upon opening. Overall super cute, I received several compliments. Excited to have a vest that is a bit different than the normal black puffer everyone else has. I would recommend, especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Must buy!!! SOOO NiCE!! This product exceeding all of my expectations! It was classy, well made, fit well to the size I ordered. Ordered a SM. Definitely recommend this be a staple in everyone’s closet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. This sat on a wish list for a while before I finally purchased. So glad I did. Fits well and goes with so many different outfits. Fitted enough, but also loose enough to wear a light fleece jacket underneath. The herringbone makes it very versatile and fashionable. Looking forward to getting lots of wear out of this vest. I also love the big pockets - large enough to fit my phone and hold it, along with other items.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Boxy Vest.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this. In the picture it looks like it has a lady's fit, but it does not. I put it on and everyone in my family immediately used the term "boxy." I have worked hard to lose weight, and this did nothing to accentuate the women's figure.
customer_reviews.author: MamaTree

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest has been a go to throw on for work and play. The extra detail on the garment makes it very work appropriate. I love the pockets, perfect for your phone. I would not consider it puffer. It is nicely tailored without the bulk of a down vest. Comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: cat54

customer_reviews.title: I really like this vest
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vest. I ordered my normal size and it fit as expected. I did not have any issues with the material or the zipper. It is a thick material that provided warmth at funeral I attended in January, paired with a scarf, it made the perfect outfit for the cold winter day. Would purchase this again, it was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: rparrish

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest. I've worn it a handful of times so far with various shirts underneath. I wear a Large in 95% of my tops and this vest was no different, granted I don't zip it up all the way (either unzipped or partial). I love that it's not super puffy and I am so happy that it's fabric as I feel it make the vest look richer. I've received multiple compliments when wearing it. I wish they offered it in more colors - I would buy it in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest! It’s exactly what I’ve been wanting for quite some time. I love almost everything about it! My only two complaints: it formed pills after the first wash and the liner is a tad bit too large so it kind of hangs down out of the bottom of the vest in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Krystin Feole

customer_reviews.title: Runs big in top and mid section smaller on hip.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fabric. The zipper is a little poorer in quality, but works just don't be rough with it. Best runs bigger in top area and tighter on hip so it's big for me everywhere but there I have a smaller waist and bust and bigger hips it seems. I am 5"8 150lbs 29" waist, 34C bust. It's a great vest for layering I just wish it was more fitted at the midsection around the waist.
customer_reviews.author: emjo37

customer_reviews.title: cozy & stylish
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful and versatile vest...got lots of compliments...just the right length! I am 5ft 6in and regular figure and took a large
customer_reviews.author: connie peebles

customer_reviews.title: Cute print
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute vest and I really like it. I only gave it four stars because of the fit in the chest. I am large chested. While the fit of the vest is perfect everywhere else, it is tight in the chest. I am able to zipper it up all the way, but it looks kind of silly because it pulls the arm holes.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: If you are on the fence about this vest, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. Perfectly plush, but not too bulky. I bought a small and it fits great. I thought it might be a little short based on some pictures and reviews, but it isn't. I bought the small and I am 5'1". Based on some other reviews, I checked the seams on my vest as soon as it arrived and they were great. No problems there. I have worn it several times and it is holding up fabulously.
customer_reviews.author: LEF

customer_reviews.title: A must fall staple
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’3 125lbs and I got this in extra small and it’s fits great! If I sized up I think it would have been to bulky on me. If I do zip up the vest it is a little tight, but that’s not the look I’m going for so it doesn’t bother me! It’s great quality and i can’t wait for the temperature to drop!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest because I wanted one that was warm but not puffy. I ordered my regular size and it fit perfect. I can wear either just a t shirt or a hoodie underneath. So cute! The zipper could be a little better quality, but it’s alright.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vest! One of my best Amazon purchases! Stylish, just the right thickness. Length hits perfect just below the waist. Sizing is accurate. 5'3, 116lbs, bought small. I wear it zipped and there's the perfect amount of room for comfort left.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!!! Great quality. Fits perfectly. I prefer to swear snug and it’s perfect for my body. I’m 5’3 120 and choose extra small. Love it. Small would have prob fit but I didn’t want it to look oversized and bulky. Extra small is beautiful fit. It looks expensive
customer_reviews.author: KMMMM

customer_reviews.title: Hole and loose threads
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this vest and it’s very beautiful ! I bought a medium but it was a bit snug over the chest area but i feel like a large would have been too big. Cons - there were loose threads all over the vest, and already a tear with the cotton coming out. Ordered a replacement. Hopefully it won’t be like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Moore

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful vest! 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I think the quality of this vest is amazing! I am 5'8 and 165 pounds, and I ordered the XL but it was too big, so I am returning for a large. Hopefully that won't be too big still.
customer_reviews.author: Leila Ghardashem

customer_reviews.title: Very cute however, came snagged.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute vest. Mine came damaged. There are snags on the front and back. It came wrapped in plastic so not sure how that happened. Will be reaching out to the buyer for an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: L Fisher

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Such a cute vest for Fall. Surprisingly warm and study construction to the garment. Obsessed with the warm, wool-like fabric. Pockets are deep and actually functional (!!). Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected, per mixed reviews.
customer_reviews.text: The vest arrived and after reading very different reviews, I unboxed it immediately once I got home! The vest was packaged nicely in a plastic bag. I inspected the material, reminds me of a burlap type material..that you can wear?! And everything was in tact! No torn sides or loose hems. For reference I have attached photos, I'm 5'6 and 160 lbs. I wear a size 40DD bra. The vest does zip up, but it is tight in my bust area however, I can still wear the vest zipped or unzipped!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Huff

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: This was a piece I wanted for sometime, and finally found online! The vest is very nicely made, stitching is well done. It's a great piece here in Phoenix when layering is needed for cool evenings but warm days in the winter. I'm only 5'2 /125 lbs, but ordered a medium so I could wear over a heavier bottom and it fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to contact the seller to let them know this, but I couldn’t find their contact information. My vest has TONS of random black strings on it (see pictures) when I first took it out of the package the strings were even in the zipper. There’s super long ones and some short ones, just poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: Would like a more tailored waist. Otherwise fits as expected. Fabric is a little itchy. More puffy than I expected. Overall very cute and goes with almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Riebeling

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. It is a very unique design and well made. Although the materials do seem a bit delicate - we will see... Im small framed at 5'2 so it feels a bit big but i still like that it casual, loose fitting yet classy. The package came within 2 weeks for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Straight fit, not good for hips when closed.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but boxy! It’s not short, but if you have wider hips than your upper body then it won’t work well. It fit me right everywhere for the small except at the bottom. It has zero stretch and is super straight, so when I closed it the bottom bunched up as soon as I moved making it bulky. It really would be better if the middle was cinched in a bit and the bottom out, overall just bulky and made me look like a size large vs a small.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This vest is well made and a lot heavier and warmer than I expected. It’s beautiful. I ordered a Medium and it is perfect and even zips up (5’3”, 145 lbs, 36-30-40).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight Tummy
customer_reviews.text: I must have recycled this, it's vague. Vaguely, I think it didn't fit across my lower torso (also known as "tummy") very well if at all. That's OK, I learned my lesson -- to purchase from producers with expertise in outdoor wear.
customer_reviews.author: unsworthyeti

customer_reviews.title: This vest is beautiful. Great quality and it's actually got padding so ...
customer_reviews.text: This vest is beautiful. Great quality and it's actually got padding so it's warm. For the price you would think it would be flimsy but that is not the case. I'm 5'3" 120 lbs and I normally wear a medium. I bought this in a medium and it fit perfectly. Not too tight and not too baggy.
customer_reviews.author: KLW

customer_reviews.title: Over all cute look
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, not made overly well, the zipper curls up. True to size. I usually wear an 8-10 and bought a Large, very comfortable with sweaters underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmom2.0

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than chart suggests.
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest, but it doesn't fit to size. I ordered the XL, and I wear a 16 on top, 18 if it runs small. My bust measures what is in the chart and this wouldn't zip shut on me. I'm super bummed out that I didn't realize all sizes are prime except for the XL, so now I have to deal with a third party to return. I wouldn't have ordered it had I realized it wasn't also prime.
customer_reviews.author: B. Culver

customer_reviews.title: ... Christmas gift for my cousin and she was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my cousin and she was very happy with it! Super cute and looks comparable to the infamous J Crew herringbone vest for a much more reasonable price! (I have the J Crew version so I can attest to this first-hand!)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L.

customer_reviews.title: Im a 36DD and I normally have a problem with things looking like a tent over my waist
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear mediums in tops, however I have an issue with jackets because my chest is larger then my midsection. Im a 36DD and I normally have a problem with things looking like a tent over my waist. I purchased a medium and was able to zip it completely. A bit snug when doing so but it was fine. Wasn't absurdly huge around my waist (i wear a size 6 or 27 in pants).
customer_reviews.author: stephers123

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. The quality is really nice given the price and the style is adorable. I ordered a small (I usually wear a small in most tops) and I am exchanging it for an x-small. It was a tad big so I'm hoping the x-small will be slightly more fitted. Either way, this vest is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, just sized small
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, however I find it's sized a bit small. I'm going to wear it unzipped, but would have liked the option to zip. Got an XL, no way it's going over a DD chest! I have several other vests by different manufacturers in XL that go up no problem, this one just doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: 3LittleFish

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: No need to go to J.Crew for the expensive one - this is great material and fits perfectly. For reference, I generally wear a M/L in tops depending and got this in a medium. Easy to wear a light sweater or flannel underneath. Agreed with material - it is warm and actual herringbone fabric- it's going to be a perfect staple in my fall wardrobe in Seattle!
customer_reviews.author: Melatsea

product_meta.title: MEROKEETY Women's Slim Fall Quilted Herringbone Puffer Vest with Zipper
feature_bullets: Our vest is U.S. Regular size!!Bust size is the most important!!!Please check the bust size chart choose your size.
Material: Cotton, Cotton Blend etc.Wash by Cold Water Only,Low Iron if Necessary.
We upgraded the vest quality,the cost goes up,so canceled the free gift,our goal are make the best quality vest!
MEROKEETY is an USA registered brand,we accept 30 days free returns.
